The story itself is actually pretty kinky in a good way. The animation is well done and its not really corny. What turned me off is a scene where you see the protagonist defecat in front of her lover. And the defecation is pretty graphic. Really an unnessecary part of the story. On the positive side its a good DVD that grabs your attention, on the negative as soon as you get into it it quickly grosses you out. Had I known it had that scene, even though its a good story, I wouldn't have gotten the DVD. I suggest if you buy it, fastfoward the gross scenes.

I was very shocked to see this in my girlfriends mailbox so soon after i ordered it. She and i enjoyed it (though I think she didn't quite enjoy the bathroom scene lol). It started off kinda "rape-y" which is what i was trying to avoid, since she's not into that kind of thing, but it didn't last long. The voice acting is typical of English-dubbed hentai though; i couldn't help but laugh when the judge who sounded like Marvin Martian from Looney Toons began to speak. i kept expecting him to say "there's supposed to be an Earth-shattering Ka-boom!". All in all, a decent purchase
